entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 5 April 2023
